long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Orbit is a tool for organising your Solana wallets. It allows you to give each wallet address a label, freeform notes and arbitrary tags. You can filter by tags, or search by label/notes. Orbit doesn't replace any of your existing wallets and can't be used to sign transactions, but it can be used to connect read-only to any Solana app.
